ai-vv45:2.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv45:3.1_0: “You gave the going-forth to the elephant,
ai-vv45:3.2_0: while walking for alms in the monastery,
ai-vv45:3.4_0: In the delightful city of the city of Kaṇṇaka
ai-vv45:4.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv45:6.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv45:7.2_0: while walking for alms in the monastery,
ai-vv45:7.4_0: In the delightful city of the city of Kaṇṇaka
ai-vv45:8.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv45:10.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv45:11.2_0: took a water-lilies in the drop.
ai-vv45:11.3_0: while walking for alms in the monastery,
ai-vv45:11.5_0: In the delightful city of the city of Kaṇṇaka
ai-vv45:12.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv45:14.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv45:15.1_0: “I am the one who is happy, Sumana,
ai-vv45:15.2_0: I gave a pair of tooth cleaners.
ai-vv45:15.3_0: while walking for alms in the monastery,
ai-vv45:15.5_0: In the delightful city of the city of Kaṇṇaka
ai-vv45:16.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
